pullRequest.title: Eliminate storeValidationRecordIfNecessary messages
pullRequest.bodyText:
A lot of these messsages were being sent during AOT
compilations. Replacing one message that fetches
all required information with invocations of multiple
methods that return the same information significantly
reduces the total message count, since the latter methods
already do a lot of server-side caching.

beforeCommit.message:
Eliminate storeValidationRecordIfNecessary messages

Signed-off-by: Dmitry Ten <Dmitry.Ten@ibm.com>

nodes.bodyText: If className is used just for traceMsg I suggest to use the same trick as above with a if (comp->getDebug()) test to avoid computing J9ROMCLASS_CLASSNAME(TR::Compiler->cls.romClassOf((TR_OpaqueClassBlock *) definingClass));
